mapper.insert:
SELECT COALESCE(MAX(BRD_NO+1),1) AS BRD_NO FROM BOARD
INSERT INTO BOARD( BRD_NO, BRD_TYPE, BRD_DIVIDE, BRD_ID, BRD_TITLE, BRD_CONTENT, BRD_GNO, BRD_STEP, BRD_INDENT, BRD_COUNT, BRD_AVAILABLE, BRD_DATE ) VALUES(#{brdNo}, #{brdType}, #{brdDivide}, #{brdId}, #{brdTitle}, #{brdContent}, #{brdNo}, 0, 0, 0, 1, NOW() )

INSERT INTO BOARD( BRD_NO, BRD_TYPE, BRD_DIVIDE, BRD_ID, BRD_TITLE, BRD_CONTENT, BRD_GNO, BRD_STEP, BRD_INDENT, BRD_COUNT, BRD_AVAILABLE, BRD_DATE ) VALUES( ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT MAX(BRD_NO)+1 FROM BOARD ) X ), #{brdType}, #{brdDivide}, #{brdId}, #{brdTitle}, #{brdContent}, ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT BRD_GNO FROM BOARD WHERE BRD_NO = #{brdNo} ) X ), ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT BRD_STEP+1 FROM BOARD WHERE BRD_NO = #{brdNo} ) X ), ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT BRD_INDENT+1 FROM BOARD WHERE BRD_NO = #{brdNo} ) X ), 0, 1, NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET BRD_STEP = BRD_STEP+1 WHERE BRD_GNO = ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT BRD_GNO FROM BOARD WHERE BRD_NO = #{brdNo} ) AS A ) AND BRD_STEP > ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT BRD_STEP FROM BOARD WHERE BRD_NO = #{brdNo} ) AS B )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD WHERE BRD_TYPE = #{menu}

SELECT BRD_NO, BRD_TYPE, BRD_DIVIDE, BRD_ID, BRD_TITLE, BRD_CONTENT, BRD_GNO, BRD_STEP, BRD_INDENT, BRD_COUNT, BRD_AVAILABLE, BRD_DATE, MEMBER.MBR_PROFILE, MEMBER.MBR_NICK, COALESCE(BRD_LIKECOUNT,0) AS BRD_LIKECOUNT FROM ( SELECT * FROM BOARD WHERE BRD_TYPE = #{menu} AND BRD_AVAILABLE = 1 ORDER BY BRD_GNO DESC, BRD_STEP ASC LIMIT #{startRow}, #{pageSize} ) AS BOARD JOIN MEMBER ON MEMBER.MBR_ID = BOARD.BRD_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT LIKE_FNO, COUNT(*) AS BRD_LIKECOUNT FROM LIKES ) LIKES ON LIKES.LIKE_FNO = BRD_NO
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM LIKES WHERE LIKE_FNO = #{likeFno} AND LIKE_ID = #{likeId}

INSERT INTO LIKES(LIKE_NO, LIKE_FNO, LIKE_ID, LIKE_DATE) VALUES(#{likeNo}, #{likeFno}, #{likeId}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT CMT_NO, CMT_BNO, CMT_ID, CMT_CONTENT, CMT_AVAILABLE, CMT_DATE, MBR_NICK, MBR_PROFILE FROM ( SELECT * FROM COMMENT WHERE CMT_BNO = #{no} ORDER BY CMT_NO ASC ) COMMENT LEFT JOIN MEMBER ON MEMBER.MBR_ID = CMT_ID

mapper.select: SELECT MAX(CMT_NO) FROM COMMENT WHERE CMT_ID = #{cmtId}

SELECT CMT_NO, CMT_BNO, CMT_ID, CMT_CONTENT, CMT_AVAILABLE, DATE_FORMAT(CMT_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d %h:%i:%s') AS CMT_DATE, MBR_ID, MBR_NICK, MBR_PROFILE FROM ( SELECT * FROM COMMENT WHERE CMT_NO = #{no} ) COMMENT JOIN MEMBER ON MEMBER.MBR_ID = CMT_ID
